document.title: Sundry Correspondence on Admission of Negroes to University, to Mr. Frank Ahlgren et al., December 16, 1955
document.abstract: Addressed to: Frank Ahlgren, John Baugh, C. E. Brehm, Quill E. Cope, O. W. Hyman, Harry W. Laughlin, George McCanless, Wassell Randolph and E. A. Waters

field.name: custom_citation
field.value: Sundry Correspondence on Admission of Negroes to University, to Mr. Frank Ahlgren et al., December 16, 1955, President's Papers, AR.0006. University of Tennessee, Knoxville, Special Collections
